data.comment: The match has started.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Masuya Ueda signals a Shonan throw-in in Kobe's half.
Masuya Ueda awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
Throw-in for Shonan at Noevir Stadium.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Kyogo Furuhashi for Kobe is whistled offside.
In the minute 15, Free kick in a good position for Kobe!
Hotaru Yamaguchi (Kobe) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Masuya Ueda signals a Shonan throw-in in Kobe's half.
Masuya Ueda awards Kobe a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Kobe have been awarded a corner by Masuya Ueda.
Gotoku Sakai (Kobe) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 24, The match at Noevir Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Kosei Tani, who is down injured.
Kosei Tani is back on his feet again.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Kyogo Furuhashi of Kobe smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kobe pushes forward through Noriaki Fujimoto, whose finish on goal is saved.
Kobe's Kyogo Furuhashi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 28, Shonan have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Shonan.
Keijiro Ogawa of Kobe gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Shonan at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Shonan.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Keijiro Ogawa hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Kobe!
In the minute 32, Kobe push forward at Noevir Stadium and Kyogo Furuhashi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Shonan defence.
Goal kick for Shonan at Noevir Stadium.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Shonan have a goal kick.
Kobe are coming forward and Kyogo Furuhashi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
In the minute 36, Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Shonan are pushing forward but Koki Tachi's finish is wide of the goal.
Masuya Ueda awards Kobe a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Shonan's Hiroshi Ibusuki gets in a shot on goal at Noevir Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
Koki Tachi (Shonan) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 40, Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Kobe.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Masuya Ueda awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Noriaki Fujimoto (Kobe) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Kobe.
Hiroshi Ibusuki gets his shot on target but fails to score for Shonan.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Kobe.
Masuya Ueda has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team replace Hiroshi Ibusuki with Hiroto Nakagawa.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Free kick Shonan.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Taiga Hata (Shonan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 54, Shonan have been awarded a corner by Masuya Ueda.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Kobe.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Noriaki Fujimoto for Kobe drives towards goal at Noevir Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 58, Kobe to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In Kobe Shonan drive forward through Akimi Barada. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Masuya Ueda.
In the minute 61, Shonan push upfield and Takuya Okamoto gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Kobe defence.
In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yutaro Oda is replacing Keijiro Ogawa for the home team.
In the minute 67, Kobe's Kyogo Furuhashi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Shonan defender.
Kobe are coming forward and Yutaro Oda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
In the minute 68, Throw-in Kobe.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Shonan.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Hiroki Iikura.
Hiroki Iikura for Kobe is back on the field again.
In the minute 71, Junya Tanaka is replacing Noriaki Fujimoto for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Kobe make their third substitution with Leo Osaki replacing Sergi Samper.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Kobe.
In Kobe Kobe drive forward through Thomas Vermaelen. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 76, Shonan have been awarded a corner by Masuya Ueda.
Takuya Okamoto (Shonan) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Naoki Yamada is on a sub for Akimi Barada for Shonan.
Shonan take a 0-1 lead thanks to Takuya Okamoto.
Great play from Naoki Yamada to set up the goal.
In the minute 79, Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Masuya Ueda awards Shonan a goal kick.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
The away team replace Takuya Okamoto with Keisuke Saka.
In Kobe, Andres Iniesta of Kobe is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Masuya Ueda signals a Kobe throw-in in Shonan's half.
In the minute 84, Shonan take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Mitsuki Saito.
Free kick Shonan.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
Leo Osaki (Kobe) gets a yellow card.
The away team have replaced Temma Matsuda with Yuto Iwasaki. This is the fourth substitution made today by Bin Ukishima.
Sosuke Shibata is replacing Satoshi Tanaka for the away team.
In the minute 89, Kobe make their fourth substitution with Daiju Sasaki replacing Kyogo Furuhashi.
Atsuhiro Miura is making the team's fifth substitution at Noevir Stadium with Ryo Hatsuse replacing Gotoku Sakai.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Shonan have a goal kick.
In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Kobe, Ryo Hatsuse (Kobe) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Kobe surge into the attack at Noevir Stadium but Thomas Vermaelenâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Shonan at Noevir Stadium.
Shonan are pushing forward but Yuto Iwasaki's finish is wide of the goal.
Kobe have a goal kick.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Kobe. The final score is 0-2.
